name: goodlink-backend
description: Cloudflare Worker for GoodLink backend - handles link redirects based on slug and domain

scripts.deploy: wrangler deploy --outdir dist --upload-source-maps --var SENTRY_RELEASE:$(sentry-cli releases propose-version)
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: _SENTRY_RELEASE=$(sentry-cli releases propose-version) && sentry-cli releases new $_SENTRY_RELEASE --org=good-link --project=node && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org=good-link --project=node --release=$_SENTRY_RELEASE --strip-prefix 'dist\..' dist
